posts.post_content:
SOLD

For sale, 1909 Obak Hap Hogan. At the risk of being called a pumper, I'm going to say that it's the best looking card in the set : )

I do acknowledge that it would look better without the creases. 

I was able to upgrade mine and would like to move this to a new home. Price is $90 net to me and I'll cover shipping.
Agreed i own one its a gorgeous card
